name: Goblins Demise
description:
This is the story of Goblins seeking refuge while their world is falling apart. You have to sacrifice one thing after another. Your home, your stuff and maybe even your relatives.

We would describe it as a text adventure with point and click elements.

Most planned features will follow in a post-jam-version but its already playable.

Browser Version works best in Firefox. Other Browsers might not be supported.
